TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceMetadataBehavior extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior

summary.span: 控制服务元数据和相关信息的发布。

span.span: Controls the publication of service metadata and associated information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 添加对象传递给集合 (或[ <serviceMetadata> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicemetadata.md)应用程序配置文件中的元素) 可以启用或禁用服务元数据发布。Add a object to the collection (or the [<serviceMetadata>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicemetadata.md) element in an application configuration file) to enable or disable the publication of service metadata. 但是，向服务添加行为并不足以启用元数据发布：However, adding the behavior to a service is not sufficient to enable metadata publication: - 要启用 WS-Transfer GET 元数据检索，还必须向您的服务添加终结点，其中协定为 `IMetadataExchange`。To enable WS-Transfer GET metadata retrieval, you must also add an endpoint to your service in which the contract is `IMetadataExchange`. 有关示例，请参阅[如何： 发布元数据服务使用代码](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-publish-metadata-for-a-service-using-code.md)。For an example, see [How to: Publish Metadata for a Service Using Code](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-publish-metadata-for-a-service-using-code.md). `IMetadataExchange` 终结点可以按配置任何其他终结点的方式进行配置。The `IMetadataExchange` endpoint can be configured as can any other endpoint. - 要启用 HTTP GET 元数据检索，请将 属性设置为 `true`。To enable HTTP GET metadata retrieval, set the property to `true`. HTTP GET 元数据的地址的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about the address of HTTP GET metadata, see . `IMetadataExchange` 终结点的地址遵循关于基址和终结点地址相结合的常规规则。The address of the `IMetadataExchange` endpoint follows the normal rules regarding the combination of base addresses and endpoint addresses. 有关详细信息，请参阅[发布元数据](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/publishing-metadata.md)。For more information, see [Publishing Metadata](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/publishing-metadata.md). 若要启用使用配置文件的元数据的发布，添加[ <serviceMetadata> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicemetadata.md)元素[ <serviceBehaviors> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors.md)元素并将相关联的元素[<服务>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service.md)想要发布元数据元素。To enable the publication of metadata using a configuration file, add the [<serviceMetadata>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicemetadata.md) element to the [<serviceBehaviors>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicebehaviors.md) element and associate the element with the [<service>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service.md) element for which you want to publish metadata. 有关示例，请参阅[如何： 使用配置文件服务的发布元数据](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-publish-metadata-for-a-service-using-a-configuration-file.md)。For an example, see [How to: Publish Metadata for a Service Using a Configuration File](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-publish-metadata-for-a-service-using-a-configuration-file.md). 该类包含以下成员：The class has the following members: - 属性指定是否为 HTTP/GET 请求返回元数据。The property specifies whether metadata is returned for HTTP/GET requests. - 属性（与基址结合使用）可指定 HTTP/GET 地址。The property (in conjunction with the base addresses) specifies the HTTP/GET address. - 属性指定是否为 HTTPS/GET 请求返回元数据。The property specifies whether metadata is returned for an HTTPS/GET request. - 属性（与基址结合使用）可指定 HTTPS/GET 地址。The property (in conjunction with the base addresses) specifies the HTTPS/GET address. - 属性返回基础导出程序。The property returns the underlying exporter. 通常，从应用程序配置文件使用 。Typically the is used from an application configuration file. 有关代码示例，请参见“示例”部分。See the Example section for a code example. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在配置文件中使用 ，以便启用进行 HTTP GET 和 WS-Transfer GET 请求的元数据支持。The following code example demonstrates the use of in a configuration file to enable metadata support for HTTP GET and WS-Transfer GET requests. [!code-csharp[ServiceMetadataBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/servicemetadatabehavior/cs/hostapplication.cs#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用以下值创建 ：Creates a with the following values: - 属性为 `false`。The property is `false`. - 属性为 `false`。The property is `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Uri ^ ExternalMetadataLocation { Uri ^ get(); void set(Uri ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置作为服务元数据的位置的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that is the location of service metadata.
The location of the service metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将对外部元数据位置的引用返回到客户端。Returns a reference to an external metadata location to clients. 属性可以是相对的，也可以是绝对的。The property can be relative or absolute. 如果是相对的，则由与 或 相对的客户端来解析地址，具体取决于该客户端检索元数据的方式。If relative, the address is resolved by the client relative to the or , depending on how the client retrieved the metadata.

exception.span: 该值为绝对值，且架构既不是 http，也不是 https。

span.span: The value is absolute and the schema is neither http nor https.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::Channels::Binding ^ HttpGetBinding { System::ServiceModel::Channels::Binding ^ get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Channels::Binding ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置当传输为 HTTP 时用于配置元数据检索的绑定。

span.span: Gets or sets a binding used to configure metadata retrieval when the transport is HTTP.

value.span: 一个 ，可用于通过 HTTP 协议检索元数据。

span.span: A that can be used to retrieve metadata over the HTTP protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在以前版本的 WCF 中，使用 HTTP GET 完成元数据检索，以通过 Web 浏览器访问服务帮助页。In previous versions of WCF, metadata retrieval was accomplished using HTTP GET to access the service help page through a web browser. 仅支持 。Only the was supported. 对于使用 HTTPS GET 的元数据检索，仅支持 。For metadata retrieval using HTTPS GET, only the was supported. HttpGetBinding 和 HttpsGetBinding 属性支持以编程方式或通过配置文件，使用绑定进行元数据检索（使用 HTTP GET 或 HTTPS GET），以及使用绑定访问可配置的服务网页。The HttpGetBinding and HttpsGetBinding properties enable the usage of bindings for metadata retrieval using HTTP GET (or HTTPS GET) and the bindings used to access service web pages to be configurable, either programmatically or through configuration files. 有关检索帮助页的详细信息，请使用和属性。For more information about retrieving help pages, use the and properties.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool HttpGetEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否发布服务元数据以便使用 HTTP/GET 请求进行检索。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to publish service metadata for retrieval using an HTTP/GET request.

value.span: 如果发布 WSDL，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the WSDL is published; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 的值是相对值，则发布元数据的地址为基址和服务地址加上 `?wsdl` querystring。If the value of is relative, the address at which the metadata is published is the base address and the service address plus a `?wsdl` querystring. 如果 的值是绝对值，则发布元数据的地址为 值的值加上 `?wsdl` querystring。If the value of is absolute the address at which the metadata is published is the value of value plus a `?wsdl` querystring. 例如，如果服务地址为 `http://localhost:8080/CalculatorService` 且 为空字符串，则 HTTP/GET 元数据地址为 `http://localhost:8080/CalculatorService?wsdl`。For example, if the service address is `http://localhost:8080/CalculatorService` and the is an empty string, the HTTP/GET metadata address is `http://localhost:8080/CalculatorService?wsdl`. 如果不启用此属性且不更改 或将其设置为相对地址，则在不使用 HTTP 基址打开服务主机的情况下会在运行时引发异常。If you do not enable this property and do not change or set it to a relative address, an exception is thrown at runtime when the service host is opened without a base address for HTTP. ## Examples 以下代码示例演示如何在配置文件中使用 ，以便启用进行 HTTP/GET 和 WS-Transfer/GET 请求的元数据支持。The following code example demonstrates the use of in a configuration file to enable metadata support for HTTP/GET and WS-Transfer/GET requests. [!code-csharp[ServiceMetadataBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/servicemetadatabehavior/cs/hostapplication.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Uri ^ HttpGetUrl { Uri ^ get(); void set(Uri ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置进行 HTTP/GET 请求的元数据发布的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location of metadata publication for HTTP/GET requests.

value.span: 元数据的绝对位置或相对位置。

span.span: The absolute or relative location of the metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 的值是相对值，则发布元数据的地址为基址和服务地址加上 `?wsdl` querystring。If the value of is relative, the address at which the metadata is published is the base address and the service address plus a `?wsdl` querystring. 如果 的值是绝对值，则发布元数据的地址为此值加上 `?wsdl` querystring。If the value of is absolute the address at which the metadata is published is this value plus a `?wsdl` querystring. 例如，如果服务地址为 `http://localhost:8080/CalculatorService` 且 为空字符串，则 HTTP/GET 元数据地址为 `http://localhost:8080/CalculatorService?wsdl`。For example, if the service address is `http://localhost:8080/CalculatorService` and the is an empty string, the HTTP/GET metadata address is `http://localhost:8080/CalculatorService?wsdl`. ## Examples 以下代码示例演示如何在配置文件中使用 ，以便启用进行 HTTP/GET 和 WS-Transfer/GET 请求的元数据支持。The following code example demonstrates the use of in a configuration file to enable metadata support for HTTP/GET and WS-Transfer/GET requests. [!code-csharp[ServiceMetadataBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/servicemetadatabehavior/cs/hostapplication.cs#1)]

value.span: 一个 ，可用于通过 HTTPS 协议检索元数据。

span.span: A that can be used to retrieve metadata over the HTTPS protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在以前版本的 WCF 中，使用 HTTP GET 完成元数据检索，以通过 Web 浏览器访问服务帮助页。In previous versions of WCF, metadata retrieval was accomplished using HTTP GET to access the service help page through a web browser. 仅支持 。Only the was supported. 对于使用 HTTPS GET 的元数据检索，仅支持 。For metadata retrieval using HTTPS GET, only the was supported. HttpGetBinding 和 HttpsGetBinding 属性支持以编程方式或通过配置文件，使用绑定进行元数据检索（使用 HTTP GET 或 HTTPS GET），以及使用绑定访问可配置的服务网页。The HttpGetBinding and HttpsGetBinding properties enable the usage of bindings for metadata retrieval using HTTP GET (or HTTPS GET) and the bindings used to access service web pages to be configurable, either programmatically or through configuration files. 有关检索帮助页的详细信息，请使用和属性。For more information about retrieving help pages, use the and properties.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool HttpsGetEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否发布服务元数据以便使用 HTTPS/GET 请求进行检索。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to publish service metadata for retrieval using an HTTPS/GET request.

value.span: 如果发布 WSDL，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the WSDL is published; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 的值是相对值，则发布元数据的地址为基址和服务地址加上 `?wsdl` querystring。If the value of is relative, the address at which the metadata is published is the base address and the service address plus a `?wsdl` querystring. 如果 的值是绝对值，则发布元数据的地址为 值的值加上 `?wsdl` querystring。If the value of is absolute the address at which the metadata is published is the value of value plus a `?wsdl` querystring. 例如，如果服务地址为 `https://localhost:8080/CalculatorService` 且 为空字符串，则 HTTPS/GET 元数据地址为 `https://localhost:8080/CalculatorService?wsdl`。For example, if the service address is `https://localhost:8080/CalculatorService` and the is an empty string, the HTTPS/GET metadata address is `https://localhost:8080/CalculatorService?wsdl`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 的值是相对值，则发布元数据的地址为基址和服务地址加上 `?wsdl` querystring。If the value of is relative, the address at which the metadata is published is the base address and the service address plus a `?wsdl` querystring. 如果 的值是绝对值，则发布元数据的地址为 值的值加上 `?wsdl` querystring。If the value of is absolute the address at which the metadata is published is the value of value plus a `?wsdl` querystring. 例如，如果服务地址为 `https://localhost:8080/CalculatorService` 且 为空字符串，则 HTTPS/GET 元数据地址为 `https://localhost:8080/CalculatorService?wsdl`。For example, if the service address is `https://localhost:8080/CalculatorService` and the is an empty string, the HTTPS/GET metadata address is `https://localhost:8080/CalculatorService?wsdl`.

span.span: Gets or sets the internal object used to publish the service metadata.
The internal object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 对象可以修改服务元数据的发布。Use the object to modify the publication of the service metadata.
